#include<bits/stdc++.h>
using namespace std;
int main(){
	//freopen("in.txt","r",stdin);
	int n; cin>>n;
	vector<pair<long long int,int> >v;
	for(int i=1; i<=n; i++){
		long long int x,y; cin>>x>>y;
		v.push_back(make_pair(x*y,n-i));
	}
	sort(v.begin(),v.end());
	reverse(v.begin(),v.end());
	int q;
	cin>>q;
	while(q--){
		int pos; cin>>pos;
		cout<<n-v[pos-1].second<<endl;
	}
}
